dict.string: Improved integration with ONLYOFFICE DocSpace v2.5
Sign in to your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace and access the new features of version 2.5
Paragraph styles management in the document editor
Create new paragraph styles and delete the ones you have already created
Vertical text alignment in shapes in all the editors
Align text vertically in shapes inserted into your docs, sheets and slides
More convenient navigation through form fields
Navigation buttons for form fields are now located on the navigation panel
